<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pass through DAG gathering a list of exports and removing barrier edges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// creating dependencies on exports. Freeing exports of successor edges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allows more scheduling freedom, and nothing should be order dependent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on exports.  Edges will be added later to order the exports.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PosCount = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
